summary: This research looked into numerous emerging Indian startups focused on Blockchain technology. The companies highlighted are all promising, extending from the sectors of cryptocurrency, financial services, AI integration to food recommendation systems. These startups are evidently contributing to the Blockchain technology landscape in India while simultaneously paving the way for future innovations in this area.
